{{Infobox USB Hub |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = USB 2.0 7-Port Hub with Power Adapter |caption2 = |pp = |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = |wikipedia = |brand = Rosewill |model = RHUB-300 |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 05/01/2013 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/Rosewill RHUB-300 |sernum = |series = |usb_ver = 2.0 |conn = Female B |size_class = desktop |vendor_id = 0409 |device_id = 005a |vendor_id2 = |device_id2 = |fcc_id = |controller_num = 2 |chip1 = NEC;μPD720114; |chip2 = NEC;μPD720114; |chip3 = |chip4 = |pwr_optional = true |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = |pwr_barrel_inner = |pwr_barrel_len = |pwr_pol = |ports = 7 |1394ports = |tt = single |power_led = green |port_led = |flags = |is_manuf = No |manuf = Sunrich Technology |manuf_model = U-340 |manuf_rev = |availability = |eoldate = |estreldate = 08/2007 |estprice = 30 |upc = 898745010541 |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B004F38VFO |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = China }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This hub presents itself to the host system as two 0409:005a devices :.. it is somewhat light ([[Weight::80g]]) for a hub of this size. *[https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=263997.0 View of the device's board on '''bitcointalk.org'''] :"MADE IN CHINA" and "PU20114-7G0A" is silkscreened on the board. The manufacturer (seems to be a [http://www.sunrichtech.com.hk/assign.asp?keyid=ba1 '''Sunrich Technology''' U-340]...) :is almost certainly the same as the [[Rosewill RHUB-210]]. The power adapter included with the hub is an ''unbranded'' :'''JD-050-020''' (100-240VAC ~ 50/60Hz -> 5VDC 2.0A). ==Pictures== The top side of the PCB is shown below.
No components are on the bottom side of the PCB.
'''User Images''' File:Roswell-rhub-310r-usb-hub-pcb-top.jpg|Roswell RHUB-310R PCB top
